name: Garden Tails
summary:
"The most relaxing puzzle game out there"

If you love wildlife and nature or are just looking for a calming time-killer, then you’ll love this game!
Enter a peaceful world and build your own garden. Complete match 3 puzzles to unlock flowers, bushes, and friendly animals.
Watch your plot become a haven for all types of life - from common critters to majestic rarities!
Unravel the charming histories and backstories of the animal friends you meet along the way.
Relax and enjoy a sense of peace and seclusion. Plants gently sway in the breeze, birds sing, and butterflies drift by.
In a world bursting with life, how many new plants and creatures will you find?
